answers.answer: I have heard that it can lower the sugar level in your body so if you have diabetes you need to get medical advice before taking it.  It could also interact with any medication that you are taking (if any) so a medical opinion is needed.  As far as working I've heard from friends that it only works while you take the tablets but as soon as you stop you regain your weight and others have said it doesn't work at all.Hope this is of help.

question: hi,I need to lose about 10 pounds im on meds that caused weight gain....so i ordered some Lipozene,I reasd where its a natural fiber product from a root..has anyone tried it,is it safe,,,
title: Liposene
